Subjects randomize 2:1 ratio receive therapy active device identical inactive sham device . Subjects treat home twice daily 60 day return clinic final evaluation . Subjects evaluate research center Baseline/Enrollment visit Day 61 assessment safety , concomitant medication , Sympathetic Skin Response ( SSR ) , Nerve Conduction Velocity ( NCV ) , Skin Perfusion Pressures ( SPP ) , Skin Biopsy complete . Subjects contact via telephone Day 14 , Day 28 Day 42 ass adherence , safety , concomitant medication . Subjects also complete Response Study Device form capture daily pain score .
